name: sst-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: pdes_mpi
variants.description: Build support for parallel discrete event simulation

variants.name: zoltan
variants.description: Use Zoltan for partitioning parallel runs

variants.name: hdf5
variants.description: Build support for HDF5 statistic output

variants.name: trackperf
variants.description: Enable tracking of simulator performance and component runtime

variants.name: preview
variants.description: Preview build with deprecated features removed

variants.name: profile
variants.description: Enable performance profiling of core features

description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit (SST) core provides a parallel
discrete event simulation (PDES) framework for performing architecture
simulations of existing and proposed HPC systems

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
HPE MPI is HPE's implementation of the Message Passing Interface (MPI)
standard. Note: HPE MPI is proprietry software. Spack will search your
current directory for the download file. Alternatively, add this file to
a mirror so that Spack can find it. For instructions on how to set up a
mirror, see https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html

dependencies.name: zoltan
dependencies.description:
The Zoltan library is a toolkit of parallel combinatorial algorithms for
parallel, unstructured, and/or adaptive scientific applications.
Zoltan's largest component is a suite of dynamic load-balancing and
partitioning algorithms that increase applications' parallel performance
by reducing idle time. Zoltan also has graph coloring and graph ordering
algorithms, which are useful in task schedulers and parallel
preconditioners.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: sst-macro
dependent_to.description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit Macroscale Element Library simulates
large-scale parallel computer architectures for the coarse-grained study
of distributed-memory applications. The simulator is driven from either
a trace file or skeleton application. SST/macro's modular architecture
can be extended with additional network models, trace file formats,
software services, and processor models.

dependent_to.name: sst-elements
dependent_to.description:
SST Elements implements a range of components for performing
architecture simulation from node-level to system-level using the SST
discrete event core.
